answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some sample RFP’s for Defined Benefit Supplemental Retirement Program.
Borough of Palmerton, PA
http://www.palmertonborough.com/pdf/RFP%20Notice_PalmertonBoro.pdf
These RFP’s are from statewide programs.
Connecticut
www.osc.ct.gov/vendor/rfps/2009/ctdcp/CTDCP-RFP-FINAL.doc 
Indiana
http://www.in.gov/inprs/files/INPRSDBSystemIntegrationRFP1102.pdf
Maryland
http://www.sra.state.md.us/Agency/Investment/RFP-Optional_Retirement_Program.pdf
I also included a sample RFP from the University of California system.
http://www.ucop.edu/purchserv/rfp/hrbdba/hrbdba_rfp.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Gregory Stopka
text: An Alliance members has a Defined Benefit Supplemental Retirement Program.  With all the attention , public pensions are receiving, they are looking at exploring alternatives to the current system.  They are looking at doing a study on the pros and cons of moving to an alternative plan such as  a defined contriubtion plan. Does anyone have any RFPs they've issued for the same purpose?
title: Seeking RFP to Study Alternatives for Defined Benefit Supplemental Retirement Program
